name: LOAD UP
description:
LOAD UP is ("NOT") a game made for the #NotAGameJam.
https://itch.io/jam/not-a-game-jam-game-jam

Basically, these were the rules:
Make "games" which are literally impossible to play.
Make games with no interaction.
Make games without mechanics.
Make games that are meant to be read, where play is a secondary concern.
Make a list of everything that makes a Game a Game and then make a game that has none of those things.
Make a game that isn’t. 

So, following those rules, I came up... with LOAD UP.
A "NOT" game mainly meant to be read.

WARNING: LOAD UP contains adult themes not suitable for children.
It does not contain any NSFW visual, but the story told is definitely something children should not read.

If you want to play a game that really IS a game,
then go check my latest horror creation:


https://approductions.itch.io/black-tree-project

Minimum system requirements:

  • O.S.: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • CPU: Pentium® III 800 MHz or higher
  • Screen resolution: 1280x720
  • Free hdd space: 75mb
  • Free ram space: 512mb
  • GPU memory: 32mb
  • DirectX®: DirectX® 8.0 or higher
